name: $aggregate
desc: Activity resulting in the structured compilation of new and preexisting content for the purposes of forming an integral object with  semantic context making it more than the sum of component parts, which would be lost if decomposed. For example, the composition of a document that includes in whole or part other documents along with new content that result in a new document that has unique semantic meaning.

name: $compose
desc: The means used to associate a set of security attributes with a specific information object as part of the data structure for that object. [ISO-10181-3 Access Control]
